meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>art</kanji> <kanji>ability</kanji> <kanji>world</kanji> is the world of <vocabulary>show business</vocabulary>, or in other words, the <vocabulary>entertainment industry</vocabulary>. To get into show business, you need abilities in the arts, after all.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
